SELECT F_TIMER_BH, F_TIMER_NAME, date_format(F_START_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_START_TIME, date_format(F_STOP_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_STOP_TIME, F_TIMER_STATE, F_TIMER_PARAMS, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE , date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE FROM issp_timer_manage where 1=1
and CONCAT(`F_TIMER_BH`,'##',`F_TIMER_NAME` ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')

SELECT F_TIMER_BH, F_TIMER_NAME, F_START_TIME, F_STOP_TIME, F_TIMER_STATE, F_TIMER_PARAMS, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE , date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE FROM issp_timer_manage where 1=1
and F_TIMER_BH = #{fTimerBh}

SELECT a.F_TIMER_BH, a.F_TIMER_NAME, a.F_TIMER_CLASSBH, a.F_TIMER_TYPEBH, a.F_LOOP_TIME, a.F_FIXED_TIME, a.F_VAR_TIME, date_format(a.F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE , date_format(a.F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE, c.F_SERVICE_URL, c.F_SERVICE_MC, c.F_METHOD FROM issp_timer_list a LEFT JOIN issp_eq_join_task b on a.F_TIMER_BH = b.F_TIMER_BH LEFT JOIN issp_intefaceadapter c on b.F_INTERFACE_GUID = c.F_GUID WHERE 1=1
and a.F_TIMER_BH = #{fTimerBh}

SELECT F_CLASS_BH, F_CLASS_NAME, F_CLASS_PATH, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE , date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE FROM issp_timer_class WHERE 1=1
and F_CLASS_BH = #{fTimerClassbh}

SELECT F_TYPE, F_NAME, F_REMARK, date_format(F_CRDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CRDATE , date_format(F_CHDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )F_CHDATE FROM issp_timer_type WHERE 1=1
and F_TYPE = #{fTimerTypebh}
